column4: btw, does anyone know of a unity key-shortcut to activate the "workspace switcher"?
press and hold the super key to see a UNITY key shortcut cheat sheet.
Not on unity so i cant look at it here. ;)
super key?
Top overlooked feature of unity
oooh
nice
i guessed "super" was windows/apple
They really need to make a 'tip of the day' type thing :)
way to many people never notice that feature
hehe
ya
and that's pretty aweesome
they should do what apple did: make a video showing off the features
...and put it on their homepage
super = cheat sheet. tap alt = the HUD,  the DASH is on.. err.. i forget.
HUD is pretty sweet. i like the name too ;)
Youtube  has a lot of the examples/tips
i wish there was a key combination to input a terminal command ;)
thats alt-f2 i thought
of course, google search has a lot of stuff alone. i dont want the sea of crap on youtube and google tho
